context: Long ago the bombs fell and the world ended. You are one of the few who is still alive. You are trying to survive by scavenging among the ruins of what is left behind.
first_story_block: You walk for two hours and take a break. You've left the town you were in and are now in a more rural area. There's a farmhouse to your right and a forest on your left.

action_results.action: go in the farmhouse and look for food.
action_results.result: You try to open the farmhouse front door, but it's locked. There's a broken window on the right and a shed behind the house.

action_results.action: go through the window into the farmhouse.
action_results.result: You break the rest of the glass in the window and try to carefully crawl through. You cut yourself on the edges as you're climbing in, but you make it inside.

action_results.action: search the farmhouse for food.
action_results.result: You find meat in the fridge that looks like it's gone bad. You also find a can of peas in the bottom of the pantry.

action_results.action: Search the farmhouse for tools and utencils.
action_results.result: You find a broom in the closet and a wooden spoon in the cupboard.

action_results.action: Open the van of peas and use the wooden spoon to eat.
action_results.result: You get the can of peas open and use the wooden spoon to take a bite of them.  They taste horrible, but you are so hungry that you hardly notice.

action_results.action: Keep eating the peas.
action_results.result: As you finish the peas, you feel your stomach begin to turn, and know you are in trouble.  You quickly look around for medicine.

action_results.action: Spit the peas onto the ground and stop eating them.
action_results.result: You begin to feel nauseous and vomit.

action_results.action: Sharpen the broom handle into a weapon for protection and use the broom head as a fire starter.
action_results.result: You put the broom into your bag and carry it around in case you need to protect yourself.

action_results.action: Move to bedroom to find more stuff
action_results.result: As you enter the bedroom, you lead with the sharpened broom handle.  Luckily it is empty, and you quickly pack up a blanket and jacket you find in the closet.

action_results.action: Check that doors are locked
action_results.result: You find one door is unlocked, leading you to a dark staircase.

action_results.action: take the spoon and the broom
action_results.result: A man appears from another room in the house.

action_results.action: Confront him - maybe he has things you can steal.
action_results.result: You pull out your gun and ask the man what he is doing there.  You notice his bag, and tell him to empty it.

action_results.action: Run away.
action_results.result: You burst through the front door of the house, knowing the man won't take kindly to you stealing the few things he had left.

action_results.action: examine the spoon
action_results.result: There's a name carved in the wood: Paolo.

action_results.action: Take the broom as a weapon
action_results.result: As I round the corner there is a man standing there. I can only assume it is Paolo.

action_results.action: Try to find Paolo to be not alone anymore
action_results.result: Seeing signs of another person gives you hope someone may be out there, even if it is just a sign they were there in the past.  You call out for Paolo, and listen in anticipation.

action_results.action: Search the farmhouse for other usable supplies.
action_results.result: You find a medikit, and a flashlight with no batteries.

action_results.action: Examine medikit.
action_results.result: The medikit is very basic.  Still it can come in handy.  You decide to take it with you.

action_results.action: Put the medikit into your bag and move on
action_results.result: You come across a girl lying on the ground. You walk over to her.

action_results.action: Examine flashlight
action_results.result: It's a large flashlight, if it had batteries it would probably light up a whole room.

action_results.action: Take flashlight.
action_results.result: You go back outside, and you notice the sun is setting: it's a bit darker already.

action_results.action: Look in bag for batteries
action_results.result: You find some batteries and put them into the flashlight and switch in on.

action_results.action: Return inside for the night
action_results.result: It is dark in here so you switch the flashlight on and scan your surroundings looking for a good spot to lie down and sleep.

action_results.action: Take the medkit.
action_results.result: You put the medkit in your bag.  You know you will probably need it.

action_results.action: Keep walking.
action_results.result: with things in the backpack is getting prepared for the unusual situations

action_results.action: Take a break to get more energy.
action_results.result: needs rest because things can complicate

action_results.action: Take the flashlight and keep looking for batteries.
action_results.result: You find batteries in an old rusty box, but they are the wrong size.

action_results.action: Look for more batteries.
action_results.result: While you are looking for more batteries, a voice behind you says "Looking for something?"

action_results.action: Take these batteries and plan to barter them later.
action_results.result: You store the batteries in your bag next to the still useless flashlight.  Maybe someone will need them and have the size you're looking for.

action_results.action: eat meat
action_results.result: Nausea sets in immediately.

action_results.action: Try shoving fingers down throat to force vomiting.
action_results.result: You throw up the rotten meat on the floor. You feel awful and are more dehydrated and hungry than before.

action_results.action: start searching for some liquid to drink
action_results.result: You spy a flash of red beneath a collapsed wall. It is a precious can of Coca-Cola. It is worth a good bit in trade, but you guzzle it down nonetheless.

action_results.action: try calling out for help
action_results.result: No one answers from the darkness.

action_results.action: Find a good place to rest until the nausea passes, or sickness worsens.
action_results.result: You lay down on the floor and fall asleep

action_results.action: Rest until I feel better
action_results.result: When you awaken the sun is bright. It is morning.

action_results.action: Panic and look for people
action_results.result: There is no one to be found. You take a few deep breaths and try to calm yourself.

action_results.action: Expel the rotten meat from your body.
action_results.result: You put the can of peas in your backpack, right now you're feeling too sick to eat them.

action_results.action: pretend death by starving, eat the rotten meat
action_results.result: The rotten meat sets off another wave of nausea, but you keep it down this time. The apocalypse has done wonders for fortifying your guts.

action_results.action: Eat the peas later
action_results.result: You wait until the nausea subsides and for your hunger to return before prying open your can of peas to eat them as you continue to look for supplies.

action_results.action: Try to eat the peas to alleviate the nausea.
action_results.result: You take a bite of the peas, but your stomach turns.  You look away as you empty your stomach out on the ground.

action_results.action: Find more food.
action_results.result: You quickly rush to the other side of the store to see if anything else remained.  You see a box of crackers under a shelf, and eat them, now hungrier than ever, despite the nausea.

action_results.action: Go to sleep.
action_results.result: When you wake up, your stomach still hurts, but you feel more energetic.

action_results.action: eat peas
action_results.result: The peas were delicious.

action_results.action: Consider eating the meat too.
action_results.result: You do not eat the meat because you don't want to get sick and not be able to scavenge.

action_results.action: Use the meat as bait to catch prey.
action_results.result: You figure animals might have stronger stomachs, and with your bow and arrow in hand, you leave the meat near the edge of the woods, and hide behind the nearest shed.

action_results.action: Look for something else to eat.
action_results.result: You find a can of peaches in a abandoned building. You open it.

action_results.action: Leave the meat and look for food elsewhere.
action_results.result: You know the meat was probably bad, but your stomach still rumbles.  You hope that you can find some more food elsewhere.

action_results.action: Search for fire making material
action_results.result: Inside a partially collapsed building, you find furniture, lots of it. It must have been a furniture store. To think, people paid good money for this stuff. Now money no longer matters, and all this fancy furniture is good for is burning.

action_results.action: Wrap meat and put in knapsack for future cooking
action_results.result: as a result of not finding any other food i done it and it was prepared nice

action_results.action: Examine meat.
action_results.result: The meat is smelling bad, but you decide not to throw it away: it may be useful as bait, or for something else.

action_results.action: put the meat in your backpack
action_results.result: The scent of the meat attracts insects and they swarm around your head.

action_results.action: cook the meat immediately so it doesnt spoil anymore
action_results.result: You store the meat away and venture to the nearest trader. You exchange part of the meat for the new universal currency, 5.56 rounds, of which you receive 10. That's 10 more than you had for your battered AR rifle.

action_results.action: Look behind fridge.
action_results.result: You look behind the fridge and find several other cans.  You wonder if the cans may have fallen behind the fridge.  You stuff them into your bag.

action_results.action: continue searching for more food
action_results.result: You dare to open the fridge, but only encounter a horrible smell.  You close the door and continue the search.

action_results.action: go outside and open a can of peas
action_results.result: You know you should ration, but the peas were so delicious, you decide to have another can.  With enough food in your bag, now, you head outside to enjoy some sun as you continue your lunch.  Luckily, these peas look as appetizing as the last can.
